attributes.comment:
These fee increases are outrageous. $460 for a Certificate of Citizenship. My
daughter automatically became a citizen when she was adopted in 2002 and yet
we are expected to pay through the nose for the proof of that? My second
daughter got her Certificate of Citizenship automatically when she was adopted in
2004. It is hard for me to understand why exactly USCIS has not retroactively
issued C of C's to those children who ARE American citizens by law but whom
the department couldn't get their act together to serve. These fees are already too
high! My husband and I work for our living and are raising two small AMERICAN
children. Surely it is not too much to expect some level of competence from the
government agencies we support with our tax money.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Paula Anderson
